reviews.customers_say: Customers praise this Irish-made sweater coat for its beautiful craftsmanship, noting it's made with care and has a nice color. They appreciate its warmth, perfect fit, and comfort, with one customer mentioning it's not itchy at all. The softness of the wool receives positive feedback, with one noting it's not very scratchy at all. The zipper quality receives mixed reviews, with some finding it stylish while others r

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, warm, high quality sweater coat
items.body: About 7 years ago I bought this sweater from a local retailer in a pretty dark cream color (not available here). It’s such a cozy, classy, dress up or down essential in my wardrobe that I searched for it online. The sweater that I ordered (dark blue) is exactly the same, just as pretty and elegant, with the same quality wool yarn. It’s definitely snugger than the one I’ve been wearing for years and I imagine it will loosen up over time. If you’re a lover of Irish wool sweaters I highly recommend this. You can’t go wrong. I’ve worn it hiking, to business meetings and over a dress on a night out. If you want one with room to layer you may want to order a size up. If you want one that fits snugly over a dress or fitted outfit, order your size. I'm 5’4 and 115 lbs and the small fits to a T. Before ordering this I ordered another one from this company with a scrunched waist that hit me in the wrong place and looked bulky. This one is simpler and more flattering. Read more
items.author: Hope Livingston

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Knit Sweater
items.body: I love this sweater, soft & beautiful. I just wish it came in XXS as the XS is a little large in the body. I suggest sizing down. Read more
items.author: Dawg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful craftsmanship.
items.body: This sweater is as beautiful as it looks in the picture. Wonderful quality. The neckline is a little different. You have to slip it over your head and then zip up, because it doesn't open at the collar. I got the blue and it's a beautiful shade. I highly recommend. I'm 5'9 and it's long enough for me. Read more
items.author: Theresa Pines

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Irish Sweater
items.body: Wonderful. This is the nicest sweater i've ever owned. It is very warm. It would probably be better to have a light, long sleeve t-shirt underneath, even though the wool is not very scratchy at all. Love this. Read more
items.author: Sandy B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aran Crafts Women's Irish Soft CableKnitted Side zip Coat Review
items.body: This is the 2nd sweater that I have purchased from Aran Crafts. I purchased the Soft Cable Knit Side Zip Coat, in the wine color, last year. I loved the sweater so much, that I purchased another one last week, in the dark green. I should have bought one earlier, as I wanted to the charcoal color, but none were available in my size. I am 5'4 and 1/4 and generally where an XS top, sometimes a S. The XS fit me just fine. I even have room to put a turtleneck underneath, but the sweater is so warm, that even in NY, it was not necessary. I generally run cold, l and find this sweater to be perfect for the cold NY winters. The sweater is beautiful and very high quality and one can clearly see that, when they take the sweater out. Gorgeous pattern/stitching and I just love the stylish zipper, not plain at all. I will note that while cute, the zipper can be a bit tricky to zip, so just zip carefully- you will be fine! I also cannot stand an itchy sweater and so far it's been great! I would highly recommend this brand and this sweater to anyone looking to purchase a warm, stylish, top-notch sweater. I found another brand to be more expensive and the quality of their sweater was ok, but not top-notch like this. Read more
items.author: Anne Marie Fardo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: Beautiful knit coat. Thick and warm. Length is perfect. Color is very nice. I'm 5'4" and 110 lbs, and I got the Small. Perfect fit. Read more
items.author: Sylvana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful heavy sweater
items.body: The sweater is beautiful and not too scratchy and very warm. It looks well open or closed Seems like high-quality and I look forward to wearing it for a long time Read more
items.author: S. spronsen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding quality
items.body: Due to reviews saying to size down, I ordered a small instead of a medium, and now have to return it because it's too small in the chest for me (I'm a 36D)...so I would order your regular size unless you have a small bust line. The quality of the garment itself is outstanding and I can't remember the last time I've been this impressed with a piece of clothing. The wool is thick and very warm, but not itchy at all. I did find the sweater to be a bit heavy on my shoulders since it's a long, thick wool coat...I may order the shorter version of this to reduce the weight of it. Of course wool like this is best spot cleaned only (it'll shrink badly if you wash it), but I find as along as I wear a shirt under it that's not deal breaker for me. Read more
items.author: Shiver

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Soft Grey, Wine, Army Green, Midnight Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
